tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    assistant_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    response TEXT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_data VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    assistant_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    assistant_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE UserInteractions ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(50), interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP, interaction_content TEXT );
CREATE TABLE Responses ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, interaction_id INT, response_type VARCHAR(50), response_timestamp TIMESTAMP, response_content TEXT );
CREATE TABLE Users ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE VirtualAssistants ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, assistant_name VARCHAR(50), assistant_type VARCHAR(50), installation_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE AssistantInteractions ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, assistant_id INT, user_id INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(50), interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP );
